results.name: Decimal expansion of number with continued fraction expansion 0, 2, 4, 6, ... (the even numbers).
link: Lucas A. Brown, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: BesselI(1, 1)/BesselI(0, 1) (courtesy of the Inverse Symbolic Calculator).
xref: Cf. A005843 (even numbers), A052119 (continued fraction exp. is 0, 1, 2, 3, ...), A073747 (coth(1), continued fraction exp. is odd numbers).
